info.description:
REST API for Thola.

For more information look at our Github : https://github.com/inexio/thola
info.title: Thola

post.summary: Check the cpu load of a device.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Check the disk of a device.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Check an hardware health of an device.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Checks if identify matches the expectations.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Check to read out interface metrics.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Check the memory usage of a device.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Check an sbc device.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Check a linux server.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Checks SNMP availability.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Check existence of thola servers.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Checks whether a UPS device has its main voltage applied.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Identifies a device.

200.description: Returns the device which was found.

400.description: Returns a string that the request was formatted wrong.

404.description: Returns a string that no device was found.

post.summary: Returns the available components for the device.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Counts the interfaces of a device.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Read out the CPU load of a device.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Reads out disk data of a device.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Reads out hardware health data of a device.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Reads out data of the interfaces of a device.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Read out the memory usage of a device.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Reads out SBC data of a device.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Reads out server data of a device.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

post.summary: Reads out UPS data of a device.

400.description: Returns an error with more details in the body.

BaseRequest.description: BaseRequest is a generic request that is processed by thola

timeout.description: Timeout for the request (0 => no timeout)

BaseResponse.description: BaseResponse defines attributes every response has.
BaseResponse.title: BaseResponse

CheckCPULoadRequest.description: CheckCPULoadRequest is a the request struct for the check cpu load request.
CheckCPULoadRequest.title: CheckCPULoadRequest

timeout.description: Timeout for the request (0 => no timeout)

ConnectionData.description: ConnectionData includes all connection data for a device.
ConnectionData.title: ConnectionData

Device.description:
Device represents a device and has the same structure as Response.
Response can possibly be removed and replaced by Device.
Device.title: Device

DeviceData.description: DeviceData includes all data that can be used to contact a device
DeviceData.title: DeviceData

EthernetLikeInterface.description: EthernetLikeInterface represents an ethernet like interface.
EthernetLikeInterface.title: EthernetLikeInterface

HTTPConnectionData.description: HTTPConnectionData includes all http connection data for a device.
HTTPConnectionData.title: HTTPConnectionData

auth_password.description: The password for authorization on the device.

auth_username.description: The username for authorization on the device.

http_ports.description: The http port(s) of the device.

https_ports.description: The https port(s) of the device.

HardwareHealthComponent.description: HardwareHealthComponent represents hardware health information of a device.
HardwareHealthComponent.title: HardwareHealthComponent

HardwareHealthComponentFan.description: HardwareHealthComponentFan represents one fan of a device.
HardwareHealthComponentFan.title: HardwareHealthComponentFan

HardwareHealthComponentPowerSupply.description: HardwareHealthComponentPowerSupply represents one power supply of a device.
HardwareHealthComponentPowerSupply.title: HardwareHealthComponentPowerSupply

IdentifyExpectationResult.title: IdentifyExpectationResult is a response struct for the check identify request.

IdentifyRequest.description: IdentifyRequest is a the request struct for the identify request.
IdentifyRequest.title: IdentifyRequest

timeout.description: Timeout for the request (0 => no timeout)

IdentifyResponse.description: IdentifyResponse is the response struct that is for identify requests.
IdentifyResponse.title: IdentifyResponse

Interface.description: Interface represents all interface values which can be read.
Interface.title: Interface

OpticalAmplifierInterface.description: OpticalAmplifierInterface represents an optical amplifier interface.
OpticalAmplifierInterface.title: OpticalAmplifierInterface

OpticalOPMInterface.description: OpticalOPMInterface represents an optical opm interface.
OpticalOPMInterface.title: OpticalOPMInterface

OpticalTransponderInterface.description: OpticalTransponderInterface represents an optical transponder interface.
OpticalTransponderInterface.title: OpticalTransponderInterface

OutputError.description: OutputError embeds all error messages which occur in requests on the API.
OutputError.title: OutputError

OutputMessage.title: OutputMessage represents a message of the response. It contains a message and a status code.

PerformanceDataPoint.title: PerformanceDataPoint contains all information of one PerformanceDataPoint.

Properties.description: Properties are properties that can be determined for a device.
Properties.title: Properties

Rate.description: Rate encapsulates values which refer to a time span.
Rate.title: Rate

ResponseInfo.title: ResponseInfo has all available information for a response. It also contains the RawOutput.

SAPInterface.description: SAPInterface represents a service access point interface.
SAPInterface.title: SAPInterface

SNMPConnectionData.description: SNMPConnectionData includes all snmp connection data for a device.
SNMPConnectionData.title: SNMPConnectionData

communities.description: The snmp community string(s) for the device.

discoverParallelRequests.description: The amount of parallel connection requests used while trying to get a valid SNMP connection.

discoverRetries.description: The retries used while trying to get a valid SNMP connection.

discoverTimeout.description: The timeout in seconds used while trying to get a valid SNMP connection.

ports.description: The snmp port(s) of the device.

versions.description: The snmp version(s) of the device.

SNMPCredentials.title: SNMPCredentials includes all credential information of the snmp connection.

SNMPv3ConnectionData.description: SNMPv3ConnectionData includes all snmp v3 specific connection data.
SNMPv3ConnectionData.title: SNMPv3ConnectionData

auth_key.description: The authentication protocol passphrase of the SNMP connection.

auth_protocol.description: The authentication protocol of the SNMP connection.

context_name.description: The context name of the SNMP connection.

level.description: The security level of the SNMP connection.

priv_key.description: The privacy protocol passphrase of the SNMP connection.

priv_protocol.description: The privacy protocol of the SNMP connection.

user.description: The user of the SNMP connection.

value.description: value represents a value that was read out from a device.
value.title: value
